import logo from './logo.svg' import './App.css' import './header.scss' import TestJs from './App.test' import TextForm from './text' import InputHeader from './input_header' import HeaderModal from './header_modal' import { useState } from 'react' // import moreBlock from './moreblock' import CSSTransitionGroup from 'react-transition-group/CSSTransitionGroup'; function App() { const [text, setText] = useState('') const [todoList, setTodoList] = useState([{id:1, text: "Снимай видео"}, {id:2, text: "Я приехал"}, {id:3, text: "До встречи"},]) function addTodo() { setTodoList([...todoList, {id: Date.now(), text}]) } return (
) } export default App
